top.headLine: Extract lyrics from any song, in any language!
top.main1: Upload your audio file, and we'll extract the lyrics for you.
top.main2: Works with music from around the world and supports automatic language detection.
top.main3: Results may vary each time - discover something new with every run!
top.main4: Processing takes about the same time as the song's length, and files are never stored.

mid.format: Accepted formats: MP3, M4A, AAC, WAV, FLAC or AIFF
